home.title: Hello, my name is Maxime Leclerc
home.introduction: I am a full stack web developer

about.title: About
about.introduction: Passionate about the web for many years, I started to acquire skills in this area through my formation. Obtaining my professional ATC Webmaster license has given me a solid foundation for designing a website. I was able to deepen this knowledge by my professional experience but also by exercising in my free time a constant watch on the technologies and languages ​​of tomorrow. I practice today for more than 4 years the job of web developer.'

skills.title: Skills
skills.introduction: From the development of features to the design of a dynamic and intuitive customer interface, my skills allow me to create a tailor-made website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.introduction: Feel free to contact me via this form for all requests, I would be happy to answer you as soon as possible.
